contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with Peter Pan
contact.subtitle: For any questions about iOS App development, feel free to contact Peter Pan anytime. When answering questions, Peter Pan also learns and grows in the process, makes friends, and gains rewards that money can't buy.
contact.qaColumn: Peter Pan's iOS Swift App Q&A Column

books.subtitle: iOS App development books, from beginner to advanced, guiding you step by step to master Swift programming

tutoring.subtitle: Professional one-on-one App development tutoring to help you realize your ideas

vibeCoding.title: Your Personal APP VIBE CODING Coach
vibeCoding.description: In the AI era, everyone can develop Apps with AI. With years of App teaching experience, Peter Pan will assist you and guide you to complete your own App using AI.

appMentor.title: Your Personal Swift / Flutter APP Development Mentor
appMentor.description: Swift and Flutter are currently the hottest cross-platform App development technologies. With years of programming experience, Peter Pan will teach you App development knowledge one-on-one, helping you become a professional App engineer.

courses.subtitle: From beginner to advanced, diverse App development courses to guide you into the world of programming

swiftIosApp.title: Peter Pan's Swift iOS App Programming
swiftIosApp.description: Learn the latest iOS App development technologies - Swift, iOS SDK, and Xcode. Become a cool iOS App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

swiftuiBeginner.title: iOS SwiftUI App Programming for Liberal Arts Students
swiftuiBeginner.description: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch, step by step! In just 12 weeks, one evening per week, you can master the core concepts of programming and become a cool iOS App development wizard!

flutterIntro.title: Flutter Cross-Platform App Programming
flutterIntro.description: Learn the latest Flutter cross-platform App development technologies - Dart, Flutter SDK, VS Code. Become a cool Flutter App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

flutterCrossPlatform.title: Peter Pan's Flutter Cross-Platform App Programming
flutterCrossPlatform.description: Learn the latest Flutter cross-platform App development technologies - Dart, Flutter SDK, VS Code. Become a cool Flutter App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

apcsAiotCamp.title: APCS Programming & AIoT Smart Applications Summer Camp
apcsAiotCamp.description: The first two and a half days focus on APCS courses, building a foundation with the hottest programming language Python. The instructor will use fun interactive teaching to help students gradually understand APCS concepts and practice problem types.

youthIosTraining.title: Youth Vocational Training iOS App Development

iosRestApi.title: iOS APP Project - REST API Integration for Social APP
iosRestApi.description: Beginners usually develop small Apps with two or three pages, rarely having experience developing complex Apps. This course will guide students to develop a social App comparable to published Apps, mastering the essential REST API integration skills for iOS App engineers.

firstSwiftuiApp.title: First Handmade iOS SwiftUI App
firstSwiftuiApp.description: Everyone has the talent to create Apps - it's time to unlock it! A hands-on iOS App course for beginners, teaching you to build Apps you love (like a beloved pet App or a sweet relationship App), installed on your own or friends' and family's iPhones to enjoy anytime.

christmasGiftApp.title: iOS App Workshop 6 - SwiftUI Christmas Gift Exchange App
christmasGiftApp.description: Develop a Christmas gift exchange App using SwiftUI

appDevSwiftBook.title: iOS App Workshop 3 - App Development with Swift eBook Code Analysis
appDevSwiftBook.description: Analyze Apple's App Development with Swift eBook code examples

swiftuiEbook.title: iOS App Workshop 5 - Create eBook App with SwiftUI
swiftuiEbook.description: Create an eBook App using SwiftUI

wwdc19Workshop.title: iOS App Workshop 4 - WWDC19 New Technology Sharing
wwdc19Workshop.description: WWDC19 New Technology Sharing - Xcode 11, iOS 13 & SwiftUI

ticTacToe.title: iOS App Workshop 2 - University of Chicago Tic-Tac-Toe App
ticTacToe.description: Learn to build the University of Chicago Stanford's Tic-Tac-Toe App

swiftRecursiveIterative.title: Classic CS Problems in Swift 1: Recursive & Iterative
swiftRecursiveIterative.description: A classic programming problem workshop for Swift iOS App development beginners.

programmingBeginnerTalk.title: How Beginners Learn Programming & Engineer Career Talk

swiftProgrammingIntro.title: Peter Pan's Swift Programming Introduction
swiftProgrammingIntro.description: Swift is Apple's new-generation programming language - concise, easy to understand, fast, and safe. With its Open Source release, Swift can not only develop iOS Apps but also Linux, Windows, Android, and even backend Apps. Now is the perfect time to learn Swift. This course uses the book 'Peter Pan's Swift Programming Introduction' to guide students through 12 hours of Swift syntax and features!

autoLayoutStackView.title: Deep Dive into Auto Layout and Stack View
autoLayoutStackView.description: Peter Pan will teach all the secrets about Auto Layout and Stack View through lectures and hands-on exercises. Creating App interfaces that adapt to various screen sizes will no longer be a challenge!

musickitLoveSong.title: Creating a MusicKit Love Song App

liberalArtsFirstApp.title: Liberal Arts Students' First iOS App Experience
liberalArtsFirstApp.description: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch and have fun building Apps! In just 2 weekends, 14 hours, you can master core programming concepts and develop your first iOS App!

iosAppWizardFree.title: How to Become an iOS App Development Wizard (Free!)
iosAppWizardFree.description: A free introductory lecture for beginners, showing you how to enter the magical world of iOS App development!

ntuCsXMobile.title: NTU CS + X Mobile App Development
ntuCsXMobile.description: NTU CS + X interdisciplinary course, learning the fundamentals and practice of mobile app development.

wwdc17Xcode9Swift4.title: Can't Help But Love Xcode 9, Swift 4, iOS 11
wwdc17Xcode9Swift4.description: WWDC17 new technology sharing - introducing the irresistible new features of Xcode 9, Swift 4, and iOS 11.

nccuSwiftIos.title: NCCU South Wind Quartet: iOS App Development & Swift Programming
nccuSwiftIos.description: Teaching iOS App development and Swift programming fundamentals as part of the NCCU South Wind Quartet event.

fcuOneSongApp.title: FCU: Build an App in One Song
fcuOneSongApp.description: A lecture at Feng Chia University, demonstrating how to build a simple App in the time of one song.

dessertAppExperience.title: After-Dinner Dessert: First App Creation Experience
dessertAppExperience.description: An App creation experience course for beginners - start learning App development as enjoyably as savoring a delightful dessert.

ntuStartupChallengeWorkshop.title: NTU Startup Challenge iOS App Development Workshop
ntuStartupChallengeWorkshop.description: Introduction to basic iOS App development techniques.

alphaCampIosBootcamp.title: ALPHA Camp iOS APP Bootcamp
alphaCampIosBootcamp.description: An iOS App course for beginners, starting from basic Xcode, Swift, and Cocoa Touch Framework, teaching you step by step to build your dream App and become an outstanding App developer.

iosAppStartupMethods.title: 13 Ways to Start a Business with iOS App Skills
iosAppStartupMethods.description: Work as an engineer at a startup, freelancing, co-founding, publishing your own App, proposing collaborations for your dreams, writing books, column writer, one-on-one tutoring, teaching at universities/cram schools/corporate training, running your own courses, online video courses, iOS App success mentor, iOS App engineer/outsourcing vendor interview consultant

firstHandmadeIosApp.title: First Handmade iOS App (990 NTD)
firstHandmadeIosApp.description: Everyone has the talent to create Apps - it's time to unlock it! A hands-on iOS App course designed for you, teaching you to build Apps you love (like a beloved pet App or a sweet relationship App), installed on your own or friends' and family's iPhones to enjoy anytime.

learnCodeFromZero.title: Learn Programming from Zero (Free)
learnCodeFromZero.description: Step by step learning programming, waiting for friends to admire you. Small steps lead to big dreams, free courses with fun programming. This course introduces basic programming concepts using the easy-to-understand Swift language, with step-by-step teaching and rich hands-on practice, making you fall in love with programming from the first try!

ncuIosAppIntro.title: NCU Computer Science iOS App Programming Introduction
ncuIosAppIntro.description: National Central University iOS App Programming Workshop.

objcToSwift.title: Swift Programming for Objective-C Engineers
objcToSwift.description: Swift is Apple's new-generation programming language - concise, easy to understand, fast, and safe. With its Open Source release, Swift can not only develop iOS Apps but also Linux, Windows, Android, and even backend Apps. Now is the perfect time to learn Swift. This course uses Peter Pan's engaging book 'Swift Programming Introduction' combined with fully-evolved Swift to guide Objective-C engineers through 7 hours of Swift syntax and features!

girlsHandmadeIosApp.title: Handmade iOS App for Girls
girlsHandmadeIosApp.description: Every girl has the talent to create Apps - it's time to unlock it! A hands-on eBook App course designed exclusively for girls, teaching you to create your own themed eBook App in 7 hours, installed on your precious iPhone to share with family and friends anytime.

ntmofaMagicApp.title: NTMOFA Magic App Workshop
ntmofaMagicApp.date: 2016/8/21 (Sun) 13:00 ~ 17:00, National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts
ntmofaMagicApp.description: Combining art and App development, guiding students to create a unique NTMOFA Magic App from scratch. Through this course, students will gain deeper understanding of 'NTMOFA Masterpieces' and 'Nature Wizard' related works, while learning iOS App creation techniques, expressing their creativity and aesthetics to build an NTMOFA Magic App installed on their own and friends' and family's iPhones.

collegeIosMagic.title: iOS App Development Magic Course for College Students
collegeIosMagic.description: Tailored for college students - whether you're a tech enthusiast or an arts major, in just 10 weeks, one evening per week, you can master the core concepts of programming and become a cool iOS App development wizard!

firstCodeContact.title: First Code Encounter
firstCodeContact.description: This course introduces basic programming concepts using the easy-to-understand Swift language, making you fall in love with programming from the first try!

findIosDeepDive.title: Peter Pan's Deep Dive into iOS App Development
findIosDeepDive.description: Special themed courses covering 7 topics including "Network Backend Integration", "Table Applications", "Photo Wall", "Stack View", "Facebook", "Maps & Location", and "App Analytics", combined with III's social data analysis SER API. Register for single sessions or all for a discount.

littlePrinceEbookApp.title: Build Your First iPhone APP (Little Prince eBook)
littlePrinceEbookApp.description: Using easy-to-understand storyboard to teach you how to build a Little Prince electronic storybook APP, making your first APP development experience effortless!

tcuIosAppIntro.title: Tzu Chi University iOS App Programming Introduction
tcuIosAppIntro.description: Tzu Chi University iOS App Programming Workshop.

hkIosCollaborative.title: Hungkuang University iOS App Collaborative Teaching
hkIosCollaborative.description: Hungkuang University iOS App collaborative teaching course.

appDreamJourney.title: Peter Pan's App Dream Journey
appDreamJourney.description: About Peter Pan's iOS App adventure story. Chaoyang University of Technology general education (2015/6/5), III Mobile Development Academy (2015/6/3), Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology CS lecture (2012/12/11), NCCU MIS lecture (2012/12/26), Donglin Rotary Club speech (2012/12/9), HPX Life 5 lecture (2012/4/5).

firstCodingExperience.title: Your First Coding Experience
firstCodingExperience.description: Always wanted to learn programming but don't know where to start? Want to experience the development process in the shortest time and learn the most important basic concepts? The "Peter Pan's App Wonderland - Your First Coding Experience" course introduces basic programming concepts using the easy-to-understand Swift language, making programming accessible from your very first try!

buildAppForLove.title: Build APP for Love
buildAppForLove.description: Love-exclusive App, the creative first choice for Valentine's Day gifts!

csuIosCollaborative.title: Cheng Shiu University iOS App Collaborative Teaching
csuIosCollaborative.description: Cheng Shiu University iOS App collaborative teaching course.

appAccountSubmission.title: App Developer Account & Submission Process
appAccountSubmission.description: Introduction to App developer account registration and submission process.

ideaToApp.title: How to Develop a Creative Idea into an App
ideaToApp.description: Sharing the complete development process from creative idea to App implementation.

mothersDayApp.title: Create a One-of-a-Kind Mother's Day Gift - An APP Just for Mom
mothersDayApp.description: Handcraft an App exclusively for your mom as the world's most unique Mother's Day gift!

mobileAppStartup.title: MOBILE APP Startup Decoded
mobileAppStartup.description: Sharing experiences and insights on Mobile App entrepreneurship.

musicBecomesApp.title: When Music Can't Help But Become an App
musicBecomesApp.description: Sharing how to transform passion for music into App creation.

qa.subtitle: Everything you need to know before learning iOS App development

iosQA.title: 10 Q&A About iOS App Development
iosQA.description: The ten most frequently asked questions about iOS App development, answered all at once
